p: Ag EIA result's confirmation was done by a real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) using One-Step Qiagen RT-PCR kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) with primers and probes ( Table S1) targeting the conserved region of the matrix (M) gene [19]. AIV positive samples were tested for H5, H7 [19] and H9 [20] subtypes following the described protocols. Samples with threshold (Ct) values <35 were considered positive.
